授業方法:
Face to Face for Lecture 1-2  and 13-14(No Hybrid), and the rest of lectures will be Online. We will conduct "Final Test" in the classroom - Lecture 13-14(Feb 25), you must physically attend the lecture. Otherwise, your test score will be "0". During the online lecture, you must turn on the Video to show your face. Otherwise, your attendance will be recorded as "Absence". In the classroom, non-class related work is prohibited. If it is noticed that you are working on non-class related matter,  your attendance will be recorded as "Absence". 
Due to the confidentiality of the content, most of the guest speech will NOT be recorded. 
Group discussion will NOT be recorded. 
Group work will be required in and outside the class room.
As this is intensive course with the short period, the lead time for assignment preparation would be quite short.
